h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
content: Use everything you've got including Body-Cooling Powder and the Fireproof Mantle to negate the fire damage while you take it down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_5_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Defeat Rusty-Gold Cart'.
The content is as follows:
Use everything you've got including Body-Cooling Powder and the Fireproof Mantle to negate the fire damage while you take it down.
